languages.text: {n}Голос Паскаля становится тише.{/n} "Законы Омниссии не знают исключений, и потому в этом ритуале я буду присутствовать рядом, дабы умилостивить рассерженного машинного духа, в чье логово вы вторгнитесь. Следуйте моей литургии, Лорд-капитан, и да обрящем благословение Его".

{n}Pasqal's voice grows quieter.{/n} "The laws of the Omnissiah know no exceptions, and so in this ritual I will remain at your side to placate the wrathful machine spirit in whose abode you will be intruding. Follow my liturgies, Lord Captain, and may we receive His blessing."
languages.original_text: {n}Голос Паскаля становится тише.{/n} "Законы Омниссии не знают исключений, и потому в этом ритуале я буду присутствовать рядом, дабы умилостивить рассерженного машинного духа, в чье логово вы вторгнитесь. Следуйте моей литургии, Лорд-капитан, и да обрящем благословение Его".

traits.locale_text: {n}Pasqal's voice grows quieter.{/n} "The laws of the Omnissiah know no exceptions, and so in this ritual I will remain at your side to placate the wrathful machine spirit in whose abode you will be intruding. Follow my liturgies, Lord Captain, and may we receive His blessing."

{n}Pasqal's voice grows quieter.{/n} "The laws of the Omnissiah know no exceptions, and so in this ritual I will remain at your side to placate the wrathful machine spirit in whose abode you will be intruding. Follow my liturgies, Lord Captain, and may we receive His blessing."

{n}Pasqal's voice grows quieter.{/n} "The laws of the Omnissiah know no exceptions, and so in this ritual I will remain at your side to placate the wrathful machine spirit in whose abode you will be intruding. Follow my liturgies, Lord Captain, and may we receive His blessing."

{n}Pasqal's voice grows quieter.{/n} "The laws of the Omnissiah know no exceptions, and so in this ritual I will remain at your side to placate the wrathful machine spirit in whose abode you will be intruding. Follow my liturgies, Lord Captain, and may we receive His blessing."

languages.text: {n}帕斯卡压低了声音。{/n}“欧姆尼塞亚的律法不会对任何人网开一面。因此，在这场仪式中，我会留在你身边，安抚愤怒的机魂，因为你毕竟是要闯入它的居所。只要按照我的仪式行事，我们就会得到祂的赐福，舰长大人。”
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal's voice grows quieter.{/n} "The laws of the Omnissiah know no exceptions, and so in this ritual I will remain at your side to placate the wrathful machine spirit in whose abode you will be intruding. Follow my liturgies, Lord Captain, and may we receive His blessing."

traits.locale_text: {n}帕斯卡压低了声音。{/n}“欧姆尼塞亚的律法不会对任何人网开一面。因此，在这场仪式中，我会留在你身边，安抚愤怒的机魂，因为你毕竟是要闯入它的居所。只要按照我的仪式行事，我们就会得到祂的赐福，舰长大人。”

languages.text: {n}パスカルの声が小さくなる。{/n}「万機神の法則に例外はありません。だからこそ、この儀式では、自分は陛下の側にいて、陛下が侵入する住処の怒れる機械精霊をなだめねばなりません。自分の儀式に従ってください、ロード・キャプテン。そして我らに神の祝福があらんことを」
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal's voice grows quieter.{/n} "The laws of the Omnissiah know no exceptions, and so in this ritual I will remain at your side to placate the wrathful machine spirit in whose abode you will be intruding. Follow my liturgies, Lord Captain, and may we receive His blessing."

traits.locale_text: {n}パスカルの声が小さくなる。{/n}「万機神の法則に例外はありません。ゆえにこそ、この儀式では、私はあなたの側にいて、あなたが侵入する住処の怒れる機械精霊をなだめねばならないのです。私の儀式に従ってください、ロード・キャプテン。そして我らに主の祝福のあらんことを」
{n}パスカルの声が小さくなる。{/n}「万機神の法則に例外はありません。だからこそ、この儀式では、自分は陛下の側にいて、陛下が侵入する住処の怒れる機械精霊をなだめねばなりません。自分の儀式に従ってください、ロード・キャプテン。そして我らに神の祝福があらんことを」

languages.text: {n}Pasqals Stimme wird leiser.{/n} "Die Gesetze des Omnissiah kennen keine Ausnahmen, und darum bleibe ich bei diesem Ritual an Eurer Seite, um den zornigen Maschinengeist zu beschwichtigen, in dessen Heimstatt Ihr eindringt. Folgt meinen Liturgien, Lord Captain, auf dass wir Seinen Segen erhalten mögen."
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal's voice grows quieter.{/n} "The laws of the Omnissiah know no exceptions, and so in this ritual I will remain at your side to placate the wrathful machine spirit in whose abode you will be intruding. Follow my liturgies, Lord Captain, and may we receive His blessing."

traits.locale_text: {n}Pasqals Stimme wird leiser.{/n} "Die Gesetze des Omnissiah kennen keine Ausnahmen, und darum bleibe ich bei diesem Ritual an Eurer Seite, um den zornigen Maschinengeist zu beschwichtigen, in dessen Heimstatt Ihr eindringt. Folgt meinen Liturgien, Lord Captain, auf dass wir Seinen Segen erhalten mögen."

languages.text: {n}La voix de Pasqal se fait plus douce.{/n} « Les lois de l'Omnimessie sont absolues, et c'est pourquoi je resterai à vos côtés tout au long du rituel pour apaiser le courroux de l'esprit de la machine dans la demeure de laquelle vous allez faire irruption. Suivez mes liturgies, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}, et nous recevrons sa bénédiction. »
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal's voice grows quieter.{/n} "The laws of the Omnissiah know no exceptions, and so in this ritual I will remain at your side to placate the wrathful machine spirit in whose abode you will be intruding. Follow my liturgies, Lord Captain, and may we receive His blessing."

traits.locale_text: {n}La voix de Pasqal se fait plus douce.{/n} « Les lois de l'Omnimessie sont absolues, et c'est pourquoi je resterai à vos côtés tout au long du rituel pour apaiser le courroux de l'esprit de la machine dans la demeure de laquelle vous allez faire irruption. Suivez mes liturgies, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}, et nous recevrons sa bénédiction. »

languages.text: {n}Pasqal baja el tono de su voz.{/n} «Las leyes del Omnissiah no conocen ninguna excepción, y por ello en este ritual permaneceré a su lado para aplacar al iracundo espíritu máquina en cuyos aposentos entrará. Siga mis liturgias, Lord Capitán, y que recibamos Su bendición».
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal's voice grows quieter.{/n} "The laws of the Omnissiah know no exceptions, and so in this ritual I will remain at your side to placate the wrathful machine spirit in whose abode you will be intruding. Follow my liturgies, Lord Captain, and may we receive His blessing."

traits.locale_text: {n}Pasqal baja el tono de su voz.{/n} «Las leyes del Omnissiah no conocen ninguna excepción, y por ello en este ritual permaneceré a su lado para aplacar al iracundo espíritu máquina en cuyos aposentos entrará. Siga mis liturgias, Lord Capitán, y que recibamos Su bendición».

languages.text: {n}Pasqal sesini alçaltıyor.{/n} "Hermesih'in kanunlarının istisnası yoktur. Bu sebepten ayin boyunca yanınızda kalacağım ki ikametine sızmış olacağınız hiddetli makine ruhunu yatıştırabilelim. Edeceğim duaları tekrarlayın Lord Kaptan ki O'nun kutsamasına nail olabilelim."
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal's voice grows quieter.{/n} "The laws of the Omnissiah know no exceptions, and so in this ritual I will remain at your side to placate the wrathful machine spirit in whose abode you will be intruding. Follow my liturgies, Lord Captain, and may we receive His blessing."

traits.locale_text: {n}Pasqal sesini alçaltıyor.{/n} "Hermesih'in kanunlarının istisnası yoktur ve bu ayinde senin yanında kalacağım ki içeri sızdığında öfkelenecek olan makine ruhunu yatıştırabileyim. Dualarımı takip et Lord Kaptan ki O'nun kutsamasına nail olabilelim."
